name: Acer Aspire Vero AV15-51
description: This computer, featuring a 15.6-inch Full HD display, is made with post-consumer recycled (PCR) plastics, making it more sustainable, environmentally friendly, and helping to reduce landfill waste. Despite its eco-friendly construction, the laptop has passed all of the brand’s durability tests, meaning it is a product built to last for many years. Its performance is powered by an Intel Core i5-1155G7 processor, which is more than sufficient to run your applications quickly and efficiently. The integrated Intel graphics card, together with an impressive 8GB of RAM, delivers high-quality graphics, faster loading times, and efficient multitasking.

name: Sony Linkbuds
description: These Sony headphones are made from recycled plastic materials sourced from car parts. Additionally, like the rest of Sony’s products, their packaging is 100% plastic-free. Weighing just 4 grams and with a compact size of 25 x 15 x 15 mm, these headphones allow you to enjoy your favorite music while staying aware of your surroundings.

name: BigBlue 28W Portatil Solar Charger
description: This portable solar panel charger features innovative technology, including a built-in ammeter and chip. The digital ammeter on the display allows you to monitor the amount of amperes and charging power, ensuring an efficient and precise charging process. Additionally, thanks to the internal chip, you can rely on stable charging, increasing charging efficiency up to 21.5%–24%. It is equipped with two smart USB ports that can detect your device and provide the fastest possible charging speed.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23
description: Made with recycled components and even fishing nets that would otherwise end up in the oceans, threatening marine life, this device is a clear example that quality and sustainability can go hand in hand. The Galaxy S23 is UL ECOLOGO certified, ensuring that the product has a reduced environmental impact.

name: Xiaomi Electric Scooter 4 Lite
description: This lightweight and easy-to-handle scooter is extremely simple to store. It includes an interactive app that allows you to access various data such as connection status and battery performance, among others. To maximize comfort while riding, it features a foam-covered handlebar. Additionally, it is equipped with a kinetic energy recovery system (KERS). This innovative system ensures that, when decelerating or braking, energy conversion is optimized, significantly increasing battery life.
